component.name: Cryobyte Utilities
component.summary: A tool used enhancing video game performance on Linux. Designed primarily for the Steam Deck, but is usable on multiple Linux Distibutions.

description.p: # Cryobyte Utilities is a game performance enhancher for Linux. This application is designed primarily for the Steam Deck, however it will work on other distributions on a "best-effort" basis.
Written by Cryobyte33, this application fine tunes Linux system settings for gaming performance.

One-click set-to-recommended settings One-click revert-to-stock settings Swap Tuner Swap File Resizer + Recovery Swappiness Changer Memory Parameter Tuning HugePages Toggle Compaction Proactiveness Changer HugePage Defragmentation Toggle Page Lock Unfairness Changer Shared Memory (shmem) Toggle Storage Manager Sync shadercache and compatdata to the same location the game is installed Delete shadercache and compatdata for whichever games you select NEW Delete the shadercache and compatdata for all uninstalled games with a single click Full CLI mode
